title: Cherry Magic
overview: Meet Achi, an extremely ordinary employee at a stationery company. He is single and a virgin because he has never been in a relationship in his life. On his 30th birthday, Achi is shocked to discover his superpower to read minds by touching people. Of course, it's not something he wants. Believing mind reading is only going to give him headaches, he avoids touching anyone at all costs. Unfortunately, Achi's situation takes a turn for the worse when he accidentally reads his handsome, perfect colleague Karan and learns that this guy who is always in a good mood and has a smile on his face is falling for him. To stop things from going too far, Achi tries to keep a distance from Karan.Achi goes to his 30-year-old writer best friend Jinta for advice, considering he might be a love expert. At first, Jinta thinks Achi has probably worked too hard and imagined things in his head. On Jinta's birthday not long after, it turns out that he is also a virgin with the same superpower. More importantly, Jinta is currently falling in love with a delivery guy named Minwho is almost 10 years apart. The two best friends are caught up in a love mess. Also in the picture are Rock, a younger staff member who seems very close to Achi and gets Karan into his possessive mode, and Pai, a cute single girl at the office whom everyone roots for to date Achi. However, Pai is a boys' love fan who can't help but notice that there's something going on between Karan and Achi in secret. How will the love story of 30-year-old virgins unfold?Â
